thread.title: Nasdaq breaking key technical level is cause for concern, says Randy Watts

title: Nasdaq breaking key technical level is cause for concern, says Randy Watts
text:
Nasdaq breaking key technical level is cause for concern, says Randy Watts 7:06pm GMT - 04:16 
William O'Neil's chief investment strategist tells Reuters' Fred Katayama U.S. investors should look to the March lows for the next level of support, adding that the majority of global markets he tracks are now in a downtrend.   
William O'Neil's chief investment strategist tells Reuters' Fred Katayama U.S. investors should look to the March lows for the next level of support, adding that the majority of global markets he tracks are now in a downtrend.  //reut.rs/2GhGw78
